resources.string: Your GPS is not Enabled. Would you like to turn it on now?
Welcome To The Jackson Bottom Wetland Reserve

string-array.name: Rules
string-array.item: Trails are open dawn to dusk, seven days a week.
The Education Center is open 10 am to 4 pm, seven days a week

resources.string: These ponds were made by people but the animals quickly moved in. You can see small tadpoles and fish along the warm edges. Look carefully and you may be able to see a bullfrog lurking in the shallows as well. Bullfrogs are not native to this area but love to eat the tadpoles and other creatures in these ponds. If the bullfrogs jump you may hear them make a funny “squeak” sound.
